Container.Name: red-discordbot
Container.Overview: The newest Red-Discordbot in a convenient multi-arch container [br][br] How to create a bot account: https://discordpy.readthedocs.io/en/v1.0.1/discord.html#creating-a-bot-account [br][br] More variables for redbot can be found in the Readme https://github.com/PhasecoreX/docker-red-discordbot

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Container Path: /data Folder to persist Red-DiscordBot data.

Config.Name: Prefix
Config.Description: The prefix you want Red-DiscordBot to use.

Config.Name: Token
Config.Description: The bot token you want Red-DiscordBot to use.
